TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PolicyLevel extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

span.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不再提供安全策略的计算机。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime (CLR) is moving away from providing security policy for computers. 我们建议你使用[Windows 软件限制策略 (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101)或[AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102)作为 CLR 安全策略的替换。We recommend that you use [Windows Software Restriction Policies (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) or [AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) as a replacement for CLR security policy. 本主题中的信息适用于.NET Framework 版本 3.5 及更早版本;它不适用于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]及更高版本。The information in this topic applies to the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier; it does not apply to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later. 有关此更改以及其他更改的详细信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 连续较低级别的层次结构表示更多的策略限制，但永远不会授予比允许的更高级别的权限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 实现以下策略级别：The following policy levels are implemented: 1. Enterprise： 在企业中的所有托管代码的安全策略。Enterprise: Security policy for all managed code in an enterprise. 2. 计算机： 在计算机上运行的所有托管代码的安全策略。Machine: Security policy for all managed code run on the computer. 3. 由用户运行的所有托管代码的用户： 安全策略。User: Security policy for all managed code run by the user. 4. 应用程序域： 应用程序中的所有托管代码的安全策略。Application domain: Security policy for all managed code in an application. 策略级别均包含一组的组织到取得 root 权限的单个树的代码组 (请参阅)、 一组指定要对代码组所属的代码可授予权限的代码组引用的命名的权限集和的列表完全信任程序集。A policy level consists of a set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree (see ), a set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group, and a list of fully-trusted assemblies. 使用要枚举的策略级别。Use to enumerate the policy levels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个新与"AppDomain"。This method creates a new with the "AppDomain". 新最初包含相同如下所示的默认计算机策略和将对象具有授予的单个根代码组`FullTrust`于的所有代码。The new will initially contain the same objects as in the default computer policy, and will have a single root code group that grants `FullTrust` to all code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被授予的完全信任的程序集的安全策略评估期间未显示在列表中，但不是会自动授予完全信任时直接通过安全策略系统计算。 are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list, but are not automatically granted full trust when directly evaluated by the security policy system. 属性不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。The property is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会进行修改当前。This method does not make modifications to the current . 相反，它更新对象的文件和安全系统用来评估策略。Instead, it updates the object's file and the that the security system uses to evaluate policy. 此方法由 caspol-恢复选项 (请参阅[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。This method is used by the caspol -recover option (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve the .

summary.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .

span.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .
The resulting .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是策略级别的基本策略求值运算。 is the basic policy evaluation operation for policy levels. 给定一组作为输入的证据，则此方法将测试从根目录开始并匹配下正常工作的代码组的成员资格条件。Given a set of evidence as input, this method tests membership conditions of code groups starting at the root and working down as matched. 匹配的代码中得到的权限组合组生成返回。The combination of permissions resulting from the matching code groups produces a that is returned. 在向代码授予权限，安全策略使用所有合适的策略级别，以及代码的权限请求的解决的策略语句。In granting permissions to code, security policy uses the resolved policy statements for all applicable policy levels, together with the code request for permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法。The following code shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CPP/policylevel.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CS/policylevel.cs#13)] [!code-vb[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/VB/policylevel.vb#13)]

exception.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve policy.

summary.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

span.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

returns.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

span.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于分析的证据集与策略级别中的代码组的效果。You can use this method to analyze the effect of the code groups in a policy level with respect to a certain set of evidence. 例如，如果安全策略不授予程序集所需的最小代码请求权限，它很难通过检查问题处于的确切位置的代码组来判断。For example, if the security policy is not granting an assembly the minimum code request permissions it needs, it can be difficult to tell by examination of the code groups exactly where the problem is. 由于此方法返回时可以有子代码组的代码组，它时，管理员可以检查的代码组和它的子代码组，并确定哪些代码组匹配。Since this method returns a code group that can have child code groups, it is possible for an administrator to examine the code group and its child code groups and determine which code groups match.

exception.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

exception.span: The parameter is .

span.span: The parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 连续较低级别的层次结构表示更多的策略限制，但永远不会授予比允许的更高级别的权限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 按顺序的策略级别如下所示。The policy levels in order are the following. 1. 企业Enterprise 2. 计算机Machine 3. “用户”User 4. 应用程序域Application domain 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .
